description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Test your piloting skills in 30 challenges over 5 levels. Collect stars, fly through hoops, shoot targets, navigate touch pads and hover pads to gain awards to unlock more challenges and faster helicopters. Find out more at pixelbitgames.webs.com and follow us on Twitter @pixelbitgames
